title: April updates to Microsoft 365 include easier account switching and new accessibility features
content:
As we’re nearing the end of April, Microsoft is once again highlighting the updates made to Microsoft 365 products and services over the past month. description: Microsoft has shared the updates it made to Microsoft 365 in April, incuding a new account switcher for its web-based apps.
